## 🧭 Objective: 
Quantify the economic and institutional effects of major conflicts.

## ✍️ Prompt: 
Which variables most strongly predict post-war economic decline? What policy implications follow?

## 📥 Load Data
```{r}
conflict_data <- read_csv("assets/datasets/war_impact.csv")

model <- lm(gdp_change ~ war_duration + casualties + infrastructure_loss, data = conflict_data)
summary(model)

```
